cmp.name: angular-tree-control
cmp.tagline: The AngularJS tree component.

cmp.name: jquery
cmp.tagline: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers.

cmp.name: twitter-bootstrap
cmp.tagline: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

cmp.name: twitter-bootstrap-css
cmp.tagline: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

cmp.name: moment
cmp.tagline: A javascript date library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates.

cmp.name: angular-moment
cmp.tagline: Angular.JS directives for Moment.JS (timeago alternative)

cmp.name: scrollTo
cmp.tagline: A simple scrollTo directive using $anchorScroll. The directive also catches the locationChangeStart event thus preventing a page reload.

cmp.name: lodash
cmp.tagline: A utility library delivering consistency, customization, performance, & extras.

cmp.name: angularjs
cmp.tagline: HTML enhanced for web apps!

cmp.name: angular-ui-bootstrap
cmp.tagline: Bootstrap components written in pure AngularJS by the AngularUI Team

cmp.name: d3
cmp.tagline: Data driven documents

cmp.name: angular-charts
cmp.tagline: angular directives for commonly used d3 charts

cmp.name: ngStorage
cmp.tagline: localStorage and sessionStorage done right for AngularJS.

cmp.name: angular-hotkeys
cmp.tagline: Configuration-centric keyboard shortcuts for your angular apps

cmp.name: ng-google-chart
cmp.tagline: Google Chart Tools AngularJS Directive Module

cmp.name: saxon-he
cmp.tagline: basic XSLT 2.0 processor

cmp.name: async
cmp.tagline: Async utilities for node and the browser

cmp.name: stacktrace
cmp.tagline: Framework-agnostic, micro-library for getting stack traces in all web browsers.

cmp.name: oci.treeview
cmp.tagline: AngularJS tree directive with subdirective for extending node behavior

cmp.name: restangular
cmp.tagline: AngularJS service to handle Rest API Restful Resources properly and easily

cmp.name: FileSaver
cmp.tagline: An HTML5 saveAs() FileSaver implementation

cmp.name: ace
cmp.tagline: Ace is an embeddable code editor written in JavaScript.

cmp.name: angular-flashr
cmp.tagline: Flashr is a library that simulates flashing in rails in AngularJS. Essentially, it allows you to post notifications via the simple api.

cmp.name: angular-ya-treeview
cmp.tagline: Yet Another Treeview for AngularJS

cmp.name: font-awesome
cmp.tagline: Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized â€” size, color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done with the power of CSS.

cmp.name: satellizer
cmp.tagline: Satellizer is a simple to use, end-to-end, token-based authentication module for AngularJS with built-in support for Google, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter authentication providers, plus Email and Password sign-in method.

cmp.name: quodatum-directives
cmp.tagline: Set of UI controls. Includes File selector with tree view

cmp.name: angular-growl-2
cmp.tagline: growl-like notifications for angularJS projects

cmp.name: AngularLogExtender
cmp.tagline: AngularLogExtender is an AngularJS module that extends the Angular $log functionality.

cmp.name: smart-table
cmp.tagline: Smart table is an Angularjs module to easily display data in a table with a set of built in features such filtering,sorting, etc in a declarative way.

cmp.name: angular-ui-router
cmp.tagline: The de-facto solution to flexible routing with nested views in AngularJS

cmp.name: angular-breadcrumb
cmp.tagline: angular-breadcrumb is a module for AngularJS, which generates a breadcrumb for any page of your application. It is strongly based on the UI-router framework and its hierarchical tree of states.
